review: It was a chance purchase that was too good to pass up and experiment with the Fire TV Stick.  It's definitely better than the Chromecast that it replaced since it's a standalone system and isn't relying on an iPad or other device.  The Fire Stick definitely has given me an avenue to explore and appreciate what's available on Amazon Prime and it is now the gateway to a great deal of entertainment that I never took advantage of, such as Starz Play and Showtime Anytime, of which I'm already subscribed through my cable company.  The Apps are great and have nothing but good things to say.
